title: json.Marshal: Conflict between documentation and implementation
body:
by **karatepekka**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Export a field in a struct
2. json.Marshal it

What is the expected output?
Lower case object key

What do you see instead?
Not lower case object key

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Mac OS X 10.6

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
23f6a8135930+ tip

There's a clear conflict between the documentation and implementation of json.Marshal.
The documentation states: "By default the object's key name is the struct field
name converted to lower case.".
This is not actually happening.
Attachments: 1. marshal.go (138 bytes)
